issue.title: App Store: 1189922191
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://apps.apple.com/us/app/eenadu-news-official-app/id1189922191](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapps.apple.com%2Fus%2Fapp%2Feenadu-news-official-app%2Fid1189922191) ### Comment > When adguard is enabled, mentioned app do not opens at all and gets struck in LOADING window only. When adguard is disabled then the mentioned app opens. Once app is opened i tried to enable adguard but the app still display ads. > Username: `@VijayChandK` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/8sa8xh8v40kcowwocws4wskc08skk0k2djz6najkcu.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/rcwtak5ydq80s00ook0cwcsccw84o0k71d7jejbl6g.jpg?nc=1)

issue.title: spicychat.ai
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [NSFW] [http://spicychat.ai](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fspicychat.ai) ### Comment > Account required to reproduce steps. Go to any character and send a message. The website will send the entire user conversation to "server.megabrain.co" to process for 'contextual ads', and then displays an ad in the chat. This site is not apart of the main service (SpicyChat). Blocking the URL stops the ads from appearing. ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/jsydi6xv15sgc0k4s4osc40gksokwsorr1ed3vkgk0.png?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin System version: | Windows 10, version 22H2 Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Ad Blocking:
EasyList

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
EasyPrivacy Other extensions used: | None
